children.text: You can duplicate and modify this template to make it your own. If you need help or want to collaborate chat with us at
. Continues to be our top performing segment.
Negotiations with Company two have been stagnant. They are holding on their ask for a 25% discount rate. Need decision from leadership if approved.

Tip: Numbers in the above summary are dynamic references and update when your underlying data updates. To create a dynamic reference in text, just drag a result from a calculation, data view or numbers side bar into your text.
Tip: You can modify the above table to create your own close rate assumptions or add new ones.

Tip: Creating a function, like the above, makes it easy to look up the CloseRate by Stage. It is used in the below table to calculate the expected revenue and makes column formulas much easier to read & maintain.
A few more calculations and tips to reuse this template
Duplicate this template to access all data. If you are not part of our private beta yet, contact our team or join the waitlist at www.decipad.com
1. Reference data from a table in a results widget

Result widgets don't currently work with tables directly (we're working on it!).  A current workaround is to create a calculation block, reference the result and assign a name, like the below . You can then select these to be displayed in a result widget.
2. Add category lists to a table

We are working on enabling category lists in tables. A current workaround is to 
1. Create a list widget like the below 
2. Select the column that you want to add a category to 
3. Select the category you want to add and it creates a list
3. Lookup individual values from a table or data view
You can't currently drag and drop single data points from a table or data view (only aggregations). To reference individual values from a specific deal from a table create a look-up.
